name: No Bake Double Good Dessert
author: Susan
summary: This easy dessert goes very fast when around our home, and there is no  baking! Always a favorite! Enjoy!!
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
directions: Press crushed cookies into the bottom of a 9x13 inch pan, reserving a few for decoration
In a medium bowl, beat together the cream cheese and confectioners' sugar
Stir in the peanut butter until well blended, then fold in the whipped topping
Spread over the crushed cookie base, sprinkle the remaining cookie chunks on top, and freeze for 1 to 2 hours
Thaw 10 to 15 minutes before cutting and serving
